item.title: Woot Word Association
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: There are some words that trigger specific responses. For me when someone mentions ‘woot’ it makes me wonder what is currently for sale over at woot.com. More often than not I then end up looking at woot.com to see what the deal is for today. I very rarely buy anything, but I look anyway. Word […]
item.content:encoded:
There are some words that trigger specific responses. For me when someone mentions ‘woot’ it makes me wonder what is currently for sale over at woot.com. More often than not I then end up looking at woot.com to see what the deal is for today. I very rarely buy anything, but I look anyway.

Word association can be a very powerful thing.
